scripts.bin: npm run bin:messageformat && npm run bin:plural && npm run bin:currency && npm run bin:list
scripts.bin:messageformat: npm run build -- --input src/bin.js --output dist/bin/messageformat && chmod +x dist/bin/messageformat
scripts.bin:plural: npm run build -- --input src/cldr/plural/index.js --output dist/bin/plural && chmod +x dist/bin/plural
scripts.bin:currency: npm run build -- --input src/cldr/currency/index.js --output dist/bin/currency && chmod +x dist/bin/currency
scripts.bin:list: npm run build -- --input src/cldr/list/index.js --output dist/bin/list && chmod +x dist/bin/list
scripts.init: npm run bin:messageformat && npm run init:plural && npm run init:currency && npm run init:list
scripts.init:plural: npm run bin:plural && dist/bin/plural | uglifyjs --beautify -- - > dist/plurals.js
scripts.init:currency: npm run bin:currency && dist/bin/currency | uglifyjs --beautify -- - > dist/currencies.js
scripts.init:list: npm run bin:list && dist/bin/list | uglifyjs --beautify -- - > dist/lists.js
